metadata.description: This template allows you to start Hop pipelines on dataflow
metadata.name: Template to start a hop pipeline

parameters.helpText: Google storage location pointing to the Hop metadata file
parameters.label: Hop Metadata Location
parameters.name: hopMetadataLocation

parameters.helpText: Google storage location pointing to the pipeline you wish to start
parameters.label: Hop Pipeline Location
parameters.name: hopPipelineLocation
